This game is nothing but competitive wonders, if your an enthusiast for hardcore competitive games then you've hit the jackpot here, i have had countless hours and the game still doesn't fail to strike my fancy on the odd occasion.

If you don't already own the game i recommend you give it a stab, there are numerous things that i dislike about the game in general, such as consistent and annoying teammates (a problem in most competitive shooters) and the fact that the game is now free and following the battle royale genre.

Overall i think the game is brilliant and would give it a 8/10

Çok fazla oynamayın cs zehirlenmesi diye bir durum vardır ki rank down silsilesine kabılıp gidersiniz. İyi oyuncularla hilelere karşı bile win alabileceğinizi unutmayın. Oldukça fazla sayıda hile kullanımı var ama sabrınız ve dirayetiniz yerinde olsun. Her zaman sakin şekilde oynayın imkansızı denemeyin. Şunu unutmayın valve bu oyunlar için hiç bir zaman hileye karşı önlem almayacak. Bu şuurda devam edin.

I like that this game is so easy to learn but hard to master that's why its such a popular game but if your a kid trying to get better its good to have your friends playing with you because some of these players are toxic.
Huge learning curve involved in playing this game, however it has brought immense joy to me over-all.
